```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Explore UWMP Data: Table 4-3 Wholesale: Total Water Demands (Converted to Acre-Feet)
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
UWMP <- readxl::read_excel("data-raw/uwmp_table_4_3_w_view_conv_to_af.xlsx") %>% 
  filter(CITY_TOWN_MUNICIPALITY == "Oakland") %>%
  glimpse()

unique(UWMP$CITY_TOWN_MUNICIPALITY)
```

## Explore Water Loss Report Data (Converted to Acre-Feet)
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
WLR <- readxl::read_excel("data-raw/water_audit_data_conv_to_af.xlsx") %>% 
  filter(REPORTING_YEAR == 2020, CITY_TOWN_MUNICIPALITY == "Oakland") %>% 
  glimpse()
unique(WLR$CITY_TOWN_MUNICIPALITY)
```
